Text:
I cant seem to make this work.
Is seems to be for mac OS 7.
Any help appreciated.
Thanks

Apparently, this App works on Classic Mac OS environments.
If you have Mac OS X, you can use an emulator called SheepShaver.
You can download the precompiled version from here: http://www.xs4all.nl/~ronaldpr/sheepshaverforum/SheepShaver_UB_20101106.zip 

Apparently, you'll need a boot image for Mac between System 7.5.3 through Mac OS 9.0.4.
You can get a copy of OS 9 here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3498222/MacOS_9_retail___updates

Here's a more detailed instruction to set up ShhepShaver:
http://www.emaculation.com/doku.php/sheepshaver_mac_os_x_setup

I'll try it too. I'll look forward for further updates from you!
